name: Lucent Umbra
description: Lucent Umbra is a game that takes place in a dystopian future where black lightning has given off enough radiation to cause the creatures on the planet to mutate. The unturned stick together in tribes. Unfortunately, Lee's tribe is running low on food. Lee must take on the challenge of going out into the dark world to try and collect enough food for their tribe. The creatures can only see in bright lights, but unfortunately for Lee, there's a freak thunderstorm tonight. You play as Lee to try and avoid the enemies in the light while still trying to gather food for the tribe. Can you make it out alive?
